Class StaffContentViewPage

java.lang.Object
application.StaffContentViewPage
public class StaffContentViewPage extends Object

The StaffContentViewPage class provides a comprehensive interface for staff members to view all content in the system. This includes questions, answers, reviews, and private messages.

This page implements User Story 1: "As a staff member, I should be able to see all questions, answers, and private feedback, so that I can monitor user interactions."

This page also implements User Story 2: "As a staff member, I should be able to flag any content that seems inappropriate or concerning, so that I can help prevent issues early." Staff can flag content by selecting it and clicking the "Flag Content" button.

The interface uses a tabbed layout where each tab displays a different type of content. Staff members can view detailed information about each item and flag concerning content for further review.

Since:

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Displays the staff content view page in the provided stage. Creates a tabbed interface with separate views for questions, answers, reviews, and private messages.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage to display the content view page

    • createQuestionsTab

      private javafx.scene.control.Tab createQuestionsTab()
      Creates the tab for viewing all questions in the system. The tab includes a table view and buttons for refreshing, viewing details, and flagging content.
      Returns:
      the questions tab

    • createAnswersTab

      private javafx.scene.control.Tab createAnswersTab()
      Creates the tab for viewing all answers in the system. The tab includes a table view and buttons for refreshing and flagging content.
      Returns:
      the answers tab

    • loadReviews

      private void loadReviews(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Review> table)
      Loads all reviews from the database and populates the table view. Reviews are collected from all answers in the system.
      Parameters:
      table - the table view to populate with reviews

    • showQuestionDetails

      private void showQuestionDetails(Question question)
      Displays detailed information about a selected question in a dialog.
      Parameters:
      question - the question to display details for, or null if none selected

    • flagQuestion

      private void flagQuestion(Question question)
      Flags a question as inappropriate or concerning. Prompts the staff member for a reason and creates a flag record in the database. Implements User Story 2.
      Parameters:
      question - the question to flag, or null if none selected

    • flagAnswer

      private void flagAnswer(Answer answer)
      Flags an answer as inappropriate or concerning. Prompts the staff member for a reason and creates a flag record in the database. Implements User Story 2.
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer to flag, or null if none selected

    • flagReview

      private void flagReview(Review review)
      Flags a review as inappropriate or concerning. Prompts the staff member for a reason and creates a flag record in the database. Implements User Story 2.
      Parameters:
      review - the review to flag, or null if none selected

    • flagMessage

      private void flagMessage(PrivateMessage message)
      Flags a private message as inappropriate or concerning. Prompts the staff member for a reason and creates a flag record in the database. Implements User Story 2.
      Parameters:
      message - the private message to flag, or null if none selected

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String content, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type)
      Displays an alert dialog with the specified title, content, and type.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      content - the content message to display
      type - the type of alert (ERROR, WARNING, INFORMATION, etc.)
